channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for UT

item.title: Report E-2024100422
item.description:
Report E-2024100422

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-21T12:23:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-08
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On October 8, 2024, two (2) 5-gallon pails of UN1760 were punctured by a damaged skid and released approximately one (1) pint of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Environmental Restoration, LLC (ER) to remediate the impacted site. ER personnel deployed granular absorbents to the UN1760-impacted trailer and swept them in with hand tools. Crews broke down one (1) impacted pallet. All spent absorbents and one (1) pallet were collected and containerized into one (1) 55-gallon drum, and two (2) 5-gallon pails of UN1760 were collected and containerized into one (1) 55-gallon drum for transport and disposal.

item.title: Report X-2024100912
item.description:
Report X-2024100912

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-17T09:14:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-18
  • City: OREM
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO CLERKS FROM PACKAGE OPENING ON SORT AISLE. UPON CHECKING THE PACKAGE THERE WAS FOUND TO BE A GROUND LIMITED QUANITY MARK ON THE INSIDE OF THE PACKAGE ON AN ADDITIONAL BOX THAT HAD DOVE BODY SPRAY, AEROSOLS.
